pages.title: Overview, It's changes Title One
pages.purpose: Introduce the Human 2nd Brain (H2B) platform, explaining its purpose as a holistic life management system and providing a high-level overview of its 8 major life domains

pages.title: System Purpose and Value Proposition
pages.purpose: Detail the core value proposition of H2B as a digital life companion, explaining how it centralizes document storage, enables goal-oriented frameworks, and provides community support

pages.title: Life Domains Overview
pages.purpose: Provide a comprehensive overview of the 8 major life domains (Health & Wellness, Finance & Assets, Vision & Goals, Relationships, Career & Learning, Lifestyle, Documents, Self Reflection) and how they integrate

pages.title: Target Audience and Use Cases
pages.purpose: Describe the diverse user base (students, professionals, families, seniors) and specific use cases for each demographic

pages.title: Architecture and Design Principles
pages.purpose: Document the foundational architectural principles that govern H2B system design, including the 20 core principles spanning human-centered design, technical excellence, and ethical AI

pages.title: Core Architectural Principles
pages.purpose: Detail the 20 architectural principles organized into 5 thematic clusters: Core Principles, Development & Quality, Global & Ethical, User Experience, and Continuous Evolution

pages.title: Technical Stack and Infrastructure
pages.purpose: Document the technology stack including React.js frontend, Node.js backend, PostgreSQL/MongoDB databases, Kubernetes orchestration, and cloud-native architecture

pages.title: Security, Privacy, and Compliance
pages.purpose: Explain security measures including Zero Trust architecture, end-to-end encryption, and compliance with GDPR, CCPA, HIPAA, and other regulations

pages.title: AI and Intelligence Layer
pages.purpose: Document the AI/ML capabilities including personalization, pattern detection, predictive analytics, and ethical AI governance principles

pages.title: Life Domains
pages.purpose: Comprehensive documentation of all 8 life domains within the H2B platform and how they interconnect to provide holistic life management

pages.title: Finance & Assets Domain
pages.purpose: Overview of the Finance & Assets domain, the most complex module with 12+ subsystems covering personal finance, investments, loans, insurance, taxes, and estate planning

pages.title: Personal Finance Tools
pages.purpose: Document the core personal finance tools including Net Worth Calculator, Budget Planner, and Debt Management with their features, data flows, and visualizations

pages.title: Loan and Credit Management
pages.purpose: Detail the Loan & Credit Companion system covering personal loans, student loans, mortgages, credit cards, and credit score monitoring with AI-driven insights

pages.title: EMI and Loan Tracking
pages.purpose: Document the EMI and Loan Tracker including EMI calculator, repayment schedules, prepayment planner, and missed payment alerts

pages.title: Investment and Portfolio Management
pages.purpose: Explain investment tracking across stocks, mutual funds, real estate, crypto, retirement accounts, and alternative investments, plus business investment management

pages.title: Tax Management
pages.purpose: Document tax filing assistance, deduction tracking, tax planning, and AI-driven tax optimization with support for multiple jurisdictions

pages.title: Insurance Management
pages.purpose: Detail insurance tracking across health, life, property, auto, and disability insurance, including AI-powered gap analysis and risk modeling

pages.title: Estate Planning
pages.purpose: Document estate planning features including wills and trusts management, beneficiary designations, asset inventory, inheritance distribution, and digital legacy

pages.title: Daily Finance and Transactions
pages.purpose: Explain daily financial management including bank account aggregation, transaction tracking, bill payments, UPI transactions, and cash flow analysis

pages.title: Financial Education and Literacy
pages.purpose: Document the Financial Education Hub with gamified learning, risk tolerance assessments, retirement planning tools, and AI-driven personalized learning paths

pages.title: Relationships & Social Life Domain
pages.purpose: Overview of the Relationships & Social Life domain covering romantic relationships, friendships, family, social events, and personality wellness

pages.title: Romantic Relationships Module
pages.purpose: Deep dive into the advanced romantic relationships features including Love Index, compatibility tracking, communication logs, intimacy prompts, conflict resolution, date planning, and AI relationship assistant

pages.title: Friendships and Social Bonds
pages.purpose: Document features for managing friendships, social connections, and maintaining social wellness

pages.title: Family and Home Life
pages.purpose: Explain tools for managing family relationships, household responsibilities, and family health coordination

pages.title: Health & Wellness Domain
pages.purpose: Document personal and family health management, health insurance, fitness tracking, and integrations with telemedicine and pharmacy services

pages.title: Career & Learning Domain
pages.purpose: Detail career planning, skill development, professional journey tracking, and lifelong learning features

pages.title: Vision & Goals Domain
pages.purpose: Explain goal-setting frameworks, vision boards, daily routines, progress tracking, and the goal orchestration system that connects all life domains

pages.title: Documents & Records Domain
pages.purpose: Document the centralized document repository, categorization system, secure storage, version control, and special document types (charity, emergency)

pages.title: Self Reflection & Growth Domain
pages.purpose: Detail mindfulness practices, self-assessment tools, personal growth tracking, and guided reflection features

pages.title: Lifestyle & Environment Domain
pages.purpose: Document features for managing living space, environmental preferences, and daily life logistics
